name: International Superstar Soccer Deluxe
overview: The best just got better... We improved our hit original game by upgrading old features and adding new ones to bring you International Superstar Soccer DELUXE - the most realistic soccer game ever released on the Super NES ...PERIOD! International Superstar Soccer Deluxe brings the thrills of world-class futbol competition to the Super NES! This is what soccer is all about. The sweat. The pain. The bruises. the Right to call your team the best in the world. And this is the only place to find it.
